pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Default master config for use with Jitsi Meet.
Like the "env" file in docker-jitsi-meet, this package manages a single block of reference information used to drive the subsequent configuration of the various necessary subcomponent services of a Jitsi Meet instance (videobridge, jicofo, webserver etc.)
With the package installed, the configuration may be updated interactively via: emerge --config jitsi-meet-master-config
This invokes a question-and-answer session to create the file /etc/jitsi/jitsi-meet-master-config which is then processed by a set of subcomponent configuration callbacks from the /etc/jitsi/config-updaters.d/ directory.
